info.title: SignNow
info.description: SignNow makes it easy to sign, send, and manage documents anywhere on any device with a simple and secure electronic signature solution.

parameters.name: template
parameters.description: Specify if document groups or group templates should be retrieved

parameters.description: Total number of items returned (between 1 and 50)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The (zero-based) offset of the first item in the collection to return

order.description: Set the order of signing for multiple signers

authentication_type.description: Verify user identity via password, SMS, or phone call

password.description: Set the password for Authentication type Password

phone.description: Specify +XXXXXXXXXXXX phone number for Authentication type Phone or SMS

expiration_days.description: Get signer be notified in how many days the invite expires

reminder.description: The number of days after sending the invite to automatically follow up with an email reminder

reassign.description: Allow signer to delegate the signing to someone else

decline_by_signature.description: Stamp a signature field as Decline to Sign if the recipient refused to sign the document

cc.description: A comma-separated emails that will be Carbon Copied in the invite

on_complete.description: All parties receive a notification email when the document is signed

post.description: Invite request with manually defined schema. It allows to setup invite for a document that will be generated in the future
